org.fujion.plotly

Class ChartOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.plotly.ChartOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class ChartOptions
extends Options
    Chart-wide settings.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ChartOptions.DoubleClickInteractionEnum 
      static class  ChartOptions.ModeBarDisplayEnum 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Boolean autosizable
      Do autosize once regardless of layout.autosize (use default width or height values otherwise).
      Boolean displaylogo
      Add the plotly logo on the end of the mode bar.
      ChartOptions.ModeBarDisplayEnum displayModeBar
      Display the mode bar.
      ChartOptions.DoubleClickInteractionEnum doubleClick
      The double click interaction.
      Boolean editable
      If true, we can edit titles, move annotations, etc - sets all pieces of "edits" unless a separate "edits" item overrides individual parts.
      EditOptions edits
      Edit options on individual elements.
      Boolean fillFrame
      If we do autosize, do we fill the container or the screen?
      Integer frameMargins
      If we do autosize, set the frame margins in percents of plot size.
      String linkText
      Text appearing in the sendData link.
      String locale
      Which localization to use.
      String mapboxAccessToken
      Mapbox access token (required to plot mapbox trace types) If using an Mapbox Atlas server, set this option to "", so that plotly.js won't attempt to authenticate to the @Option public Mapbox server.
      Boolean modeBarButtons
      Fully custom mode bar buttons as nested array, where the outer arrays represents button groups, and the inner arrays have buttons config objects or names of default buttons.
      String[] modeBarButtonsToRemove
      Remove mode bar button by name.
      Integer plotGlPixelRatio
      Increase the pixel ratio for Gl plot images.
      Integer queueLength
      The length of the undo/redo queue.
      Boolean scrollZoom
      Mouse wheel or two-finger scroll zooms the plot.
      Boolean sendData
      If we show a link, does it contain data or just link to a plotly file?
      String setBackground
      Background setting function "transparent" (the default) sets the background "layout.paper_color" "opaque" blends bg color with white ensuring an opaque background or any other custom function of gd
      Boolean showAxisDragHandles
      Enable axis pan/zoom drag handles.
      Boolean showAxisRangeEntryBoxes
      Enable direct range entry at the pan/zoom drag points (drag handles must be enabled above).
      Boolean showLink
      Link to open this plot in plotly.
      Boolean showSources
      False or function adding source(s) to linkText.
      Boolean showTips
      New users see some hints about interactivity.
      Boolean staticPlot
      Set to true for no interactivity (e.g., for export or image generation).
      String topojsonURL
      URL to topojson files used in geo charts.

      ChartOptions()

    • Field Detail

      • autosizable

        @Option
public Boolean autosizable
        Do autosize once regardless of layout.autosize (use default width or height values otherwise).

        Default: false

      • displaylogo

        @Option
public Boolean displaylogo
        Add the plotly logo on the end of the mode bar.

        Default: true

      • displayModeBar

        @Option
public ChartOptions.ModeBarDisplayEnum displayModeBar
        Display the mode bar.

        Default: HOVER

      • doubleClick

        @Option
public ChartOptions.DoubleClickInteractionEnum doubleClick
        The double click interaction.

        Default: RESET_AUTOSIZE

      • editable

        @Option
public Boolean editable
        If true, we can edit titles, move annotations, etc - sets all pieces of "edits" unless a separate "edits" item overrides individual parts.

        Default: false

      • edits

        @Option
public final EditOptions edits
        Edit options on individual elements.

      • fillFrame

        @Option
public Boolean fillFrame
        If we do autosize, do we fill the container or the screen?

        Default: false

      • frameMargins

        @Option
public Integer frameMargins
        If we do autosize, set the frame margins in percents of plot size.

        Defaults: 0

      • linkText

        @Option
public String linkText
        Text appearing in the sendData link.

        Default: "Edit chart"

      • locale

        @Option
public String locale
        Which localization to use. Should be a string like "en" or "en-US".

        Default: "en-US"

      • mapboxAccessToken

        @Option
public String mapboxAccessToken
        Mapbox access token (required to plot mapbox trace types) If using an Mapbox Atlas server, set this option to "", so that plotly.js won't attempt to authenticate to the @Option public Mapbox server.

      • modeBarButtons

        @Option
public Boolean modeBarButtons
        Fully custom mode bar buttons as nested array, where the outer arrays represents button groups, and the inner arrays have buttons config objects or names of default buttons.

        Default: false

      • modeBarButtonsToRemove

        @Option
public String[] modeBarButtonsToRemove
        Remove mode bar button by name.

      • plotGlPixelRatio

        @Option
public Integer plotGlPixelRatio
        Increase the pixel ratio for Gl plot images.

        Default: 2

      • queueLength

        @Option
public Integer queueLength
        The length of the undo/redo queue.

        Default: 0

      • scrollZoom

        @Option
public Boolean scrollZoom
        Mouse wheel or two-finger scroll zooms the plot.

        Default: false

      • sendData

        @Option
public Boolean sendData
        If we show a link, does it contain data or just link to a plotly file?

        Default: true

      • setBackground

        @Option
public String setBackground
        Background setting function "transparent" (the default) sets the background "layout.paper_color" "opaque" blends bg color with white ensuring an opaque background or any other custom function of gd

      • showAxisDragHandles

        @Option
public Boolean showAxisDragHandles
        Enable axis pan/zoom drag handles.

        Default: true

      • showAxisRangeEntryBoxes

        @Option
public Boolean showAxisRangeEntryBoxes
        Enable direct range entry at the pan/zoom drag points (drag handles must be enabled above).

        Default: true

      • showLink

        @Option
public Boolean showLink
        Link to open this plot in plotly.

        Default: false

      • showSources

        @Option
public Boolean showSources
        False or function adding source(s) to linkText.

      • showTips

        @Option
public Boolean showTips
        New users see some hints about interactivity.

        Default: true

      • staticPlot

        @Option
public Boolean staticPlot
        Set to true for no interactivity (e.g., for export or image generation).

        Default: false

      • topojsonURL

        @Option
public String topojsonURL
        URL to topojson files used in geo charts.

        Default: "https://cdn.plot.ly/"

      • ChartOptions

        public ChartOptions()
